name: Space Pirates (WIP)
description:
Command your space army. Will you fight the pirates or join them?

Controls

  • W, A, S, D or arrow keys to move the camera
  • Z, X to zoom in and out
  • Left and right click to select and give orders; orders include
    • Move
    • Attack
    • Repair
  • Hold down shift to multi-select
  • Q then right click to attack move
  • Space to pause/resume the game; orders can be made while it is paused
  • 1-8 to select soundtrack (defaults to no soundtrack)
  • 0 to remove soundtrack
  • E diagnostic information
  • Esc exits the game (no prompt)

Background

This is a game I started many years back. I'd like to re-start the development as there is a lot of potential for the project.

As of the time of this writing, the project is barely playable. You can capture a pirate base and fend of an infinite hoard of pirates. You can also build a handful of buildings. The project  is also missing configuration options and has a monitoring window that is used for development.

Please leave feedback. The more feedback I get, the more I will work on this project!

Thanks for playing.
